=使用pip install mysql-python=

===提示错误mysql_config not found===
在环境变量中添加`export PATH=$PATH:/Applications/MampStack.app/Contents/Resources/app/mysql/bin`
===提示错误Library not loaded: libmysqlclient.18.dylib===
在环境变量中添加`export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/Applications/MampStack.app/Contents/Resources/app/mysql/lib`
